## Source: amazon-inspector (7b70672e328a6c37f9f5a2f333c52648043af35a44d4a7c33fce30d4dde10869)
The package baidu-src-test was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1493238c2d847f5a7cbc807a1306e16c6e68b74612e8a28c1e2ada732eb952bb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'baidu-src-test' @ 0.0.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
